featured.text: When you listen to someone speaking, do you see a rainbow of colors?
The most compelling support, however, comes from brain scans, which show that color processing areas in the brain light up when these people listen to certain words.
(21) listening well is a rare talent that everyone should treasure.
Surprisingly, the audience listened with full focus and high spirits.

other.text: No doubt his ability to listen contributed (28) his capacity to write.
his primary school classmate Mary until he listened to her self-introduction.
They have set up “listening clinics” and courses to find out what is wrong—and what to do about it. 31.
Much of your success, both in your work and social life, 39 how you listen.
By reading and listening to folk tales, we may gain a better understanding of the true values, beliefs, and goals of a people. 41.

definition.zh_def: 聆聽，注意地接收聲音或信息。
definition.en_def: To give attention to sound or to hear something attentively.
definition.example: Please listen carefully to the instructions.
